title: How Dave Dombrowski Led the Phillies to the World Series
description: Dave Dombrowski has led four franchises to the World Series as a president of baseball operations, and he has done it by embracing tradition and analytics.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:description: Dave Dombrowski has been working in M.L.B. front offices since 1978. As a president of baseball operations, he has led four different franchises to the World Series.
